{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23891v1", "title": "Monodromy of Darboux transformations of polarised curves", "summary": "We show that every finite type polarised curve in the conformal $2$-sphere
with a polynomial conserved quantity admits a resonance point, under a
non-orthogonality assumption on the conserved quantity. Using this fact, we
deduce that every finite type curve polarised by space form arc-length in the
conformal $2$-sphere admits a resonance point, possibly on a multiple cover.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-03-31T09:42:15Z"}
